MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL29 postcode area of Old Colwyn, affecting properties in Maes Elian and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30 pm to repair a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:30 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:42 pm on 13th October, 2020.
